name: communistically
content:

in a way that relates to is or typical of communism (= the belief in a society without different social classes, and in which the methods of production are owned and controlled by all its members): They found that communistically minded workers had infiltrated one section of the party. Living communally is not the same as living communistically because it is not a question of "to each according to his needs".
